Reviews.Title: IT WAS NOT WHAT I HOPPED FOR!
Reviews.Author: Lola Potosi-Males
Reviews.Content: I AM NOT HAPPY WITH THIS TOSHIBA, IT WAS ONLY 4GB AND ONLY 500 GB? I PAID FOR 6GB AND 640 GB! I FELL CHEATED!

Reviews.Title: The reviews below are not accurate
Reviews.Author: sirak
Reviews.Content: Go to Staple-com website for almost 100 good reviews...Obviously the 3 reviewers either received a defective unit (which happens from time to time) or they don't know how to operate a computer (especially windows 8).As someone who has purchased more than one Toshiba brand, I always tell friends to buy this brand is because it is the best brand. Lenovo makes pretty good laptops too.This laptop is good for 90% of the population who need a laptop to surf, watch videos, email, play basic games, write documents and spreadsheets. The is not a gaming machine or it would cost much much more.This is as good a computer as any that is at this price range. The brand makes it a bit better in my opinion.Other Toshiba owners should provide their input here...EDIT:Search: Intel Pentium B980Look at the reviews and chart at the bottom of the notebookcheck_net website...

Reviews.Title: Complex
Reviews.Author: Norman H. Haga
Reviews.Content: I hate the FLAT KEYBOARD KEYS! ! ! ! they have no way of connecting your fingers to them, awkward!!!!I chose this product because I had an Old Toshiba and loved it and also because of th price.Touch Pad too large and wrong location, constantly changing my cursor location because of simplytouching it erroneously.
